samples.instruction: 'Aakkam izhandhaemenru' - tholvi patriya kural enna solludhu?
samples.current_output: Kural: 'Aakkam izhandhaemenru allaaVaar ookkam oruvandam kaiththudai yaar'. Artham: Selvam izhandhaalum 'izhandhuVittom' endru azhuvaar alla, ookkam ullavargal. Setbacks-kku cry panravargal weak. Strong people bounce back. Resilience is wealth!

Kural related meaning: Panakkaarargalukkku azhagu ennavendral pirarukku uthavuvadhu. Ezhaigalukkku azhagu ennavendral ketkaamal iruppadu. True wealth = giving, True dignity = self-respect even in poverty.

samples.instruction: Siddhargal jaadhi, madham patri enna solkirargal?
samples.current_output: Siddhargal jaadhi, madha verupaadugalai kadumayaga ethirththargal: 1) 'Ondre kulam oruvane devan' - Thirumoolar, 2) 'Jaadhiyum illai samayamum illai' - Siva Vaakkiyar, 3) Ella siddhargalum vevveru jaadhi backgrounds-lirundhu vandhavargal. Padiththavargal mattumalla, idaiyar, nesavaalar ellaarum siddhargalaaga aanaargal. True spirituality-kku jaadhi thadai illai enbadhu avargal message.

samples.instruction: Kuzhanthaigalukkku Tamil saints patri eppadi karpikkalam?
samples.current_output: Kuzhanthaigalukkku karpikka: 1) Aathichudi memorize pannunga - school-la karpikiraargal, 2) Kadhai sollungga - Kannappar, Avvaiyar kathaigal interesting, 3) Amar Chitra Katha comics - Tamil saints series, 4) YouTube videos - animated stories, 5) Kovil visit - samaadhigal kaattunga, 6) Thiruppaavai paadunga - Margazhiyil daily oru paasuram, 7) Periya Puranam children's version books. Make it story-based, not lecture-based!

samples.instruction: Sekkizhaar yaar? Periya Puranam endraal enna?
samples.current_output: Sekkizhaar - Chozha mannan Kulothunga II-oda amaichar. 12th century. 'Periya Puranam' ezhuthiyavar - 63 Nayanmaargaloda varalaaru. 4286 paadalgal. 12-vadhu Thirumurai endru azhaikkapadugiradhu. Mannan Jain ilakkiyam padikka, Sekkizhaar 'idhai vida sirandha Saiva ilakkiyam ezhudhugiren' endru solli Periya Puranam padaiththaar endru kadhai. Tamil literary masterpiece!

Aandaal - 12 Azhvaargalil ore penn. Srivilliputhooril Periyaazhvaaraal valarkkappattavar. Ranganatharai (Srirangam) kanavaragaa karudhi, avaraiye manandhaar endru nambappadugiradhu. Thiruppaavai - 30 paasurangal, Margazhi maadhaththil paadappduvathu. 'Margazhith thingal madhiniraindha nannaalaal' endru thodangum. Kovilgal, veedugalil Margazhiyil dhinamum oru paasuram paaduvathu tradition. Naachiyar Thirumozhi matroru padaippu.

Ramana Maharishi (1879-1950) - Thiruvannamalayoda gnaani. 16 vayathil death experience-kkup pin Thiruvannamalai vandhu thavam seydhaar. 'Naan yaar?' (Who am I?) endra self-enquiry method karpithThavar. Arunachalam malaiyai vittu nagaravillai. Ulagengum bhakthargal vandhanar. Sri Ramana Ashram indrum active. Paul Brunton, Arthur Osborne pondror ivarai ulagirrku arimugappaduththinar. Modern-day saint!

samples.instruction: 'Agara mudhala ezhuththellam' - indha kuraloda artham enna?
samples.current_output: Kural: 'Agara mudhala ezhuththellam aadhi bhagavan mudhatre ulagu'. Artham: Ezhuththukkal ellam 'A' endra ezhuththil thodanguvadhu pola, ulagam muzhuvathum iraivanaaal thodangiyathu. Idhu Thirukkuraloda mudhal kural. Kadavul Vaazhtthu adhigaarathil ulladhu.

samples.instruction: 'Pirivoora naanam thudaippadu' - pirivoda vali patriya kural enna solludhu?
samples.current_output: Kural: Pirivutru kannootla verullaan kannootla punarvadhu sindhippaan pondru. Artham: Kaadhalan pirindhu sendraalum, avan thirumbi varuvaan endra nambikkayil kaadhali kaaththirukkiraal. Long-distance relationship-a 2000 varudangalukkku munnabe Valluvar purindhukkondaar.

'Manamaatchi illaalkan illayin vaazhkkai enaimaatchith thaayinum il'. Nalla illaththarasi illaaVittaal endha selvamum payanillai. Melum: 'Pennin perunthakka yaavula' - penn enbadhu migapperiya varam. Decision ungaludayadhu - aanaal compatibility, values paarungal, external beauty mattum alla.

samples.instruction: 'Thelliya vaayudaiya mannarai' - nalla leader-oda tharam enna?
samples.current_output: Kural: 'Solluga sollir payanudaiya sollarka sollir payanilaach sol'. Artham: Payanulla vaarthaigalaiye pesungal. Payanatra vaarthaigalai pesaadheeargal. Speak only what adds value. Avoid meaningless talk. Quality over quantity in communication!

samples.instruction: 'Yaadhanum naadaamaal ooraamaal' - indha pugazh petra kural enna solludhu?
samples.current_output: Kural: 'Yaadhanum naadaamaal ooraamaal ennoruvan saandhunaiyum kallaadha vaaru'. Artham: Endha naadum endha oorum kalvi katravanukku sondham. Avan engu sendraalum madhippu peruvaan. Aanaal kalvi illadhavan saagum varai ondrum illaadhavanagave iruppaan. Kalviyoda avasiyathai valiyuruththum kural.

Kondraivendhan - Avvaiyaaroda matroru needhi nool. Aathichudiyai vida virivaanadhu - ovvondrum irandu varigal. 'Kondrai' enbadhu oru poo - Sivanukku uriyathu. Famous examples: 1) 'Annaiyum pithavum munnarri deivam' - parents are first gods, 2) 'Eeyaar thettai theeyaar kolvar' - misers' wealth goes to bad people, 3) 'Undi surungudhal pendirkku azhagu' - modesty in eating is beauty for women. Values andha kaalathirkku etravai - sila indru discuss seiyalam.

Thirukkural formally UN-aal recognize aagavillai, aanaal: 1) UN conferences-la Thirukkural quotes cite aagiyullana, 2) UNESCO Tamil-a classical language-aaga recognize panniyabodhu Thirukkural-a highlight panniyathu, 3) International scholars Thirukkural-a 'Universal ethical text' endru praise panraanga. Thirukkural-a UN officially recognize panna vendum endru campaign nadakkiradhu.

Thanjavur Oviyam - Tamil Nadu-oda traditional painting style. 16th century-la Nayak period-la develop aanadhu. Sirappugal: 1) Gold foil work - relief, 3D effect, 2) Semi-precious stones embedded, 3) Vibrant colors, 4) Hindu gods, goddesses themes, 5) Wooden base with cloth coating. GI (Geographical Indication) tag petradhu. Prices: â‚¹500 (small) to â‚¹50,000+ (large). Thanjavur-la niraiya shops. Wedding gift-aaga popular. Museum quality pieces collectors buy panraanga.

1) Valluvar Kottam, Nungambakkam - auditorium + museum, 2) Thiruvalluvar Silai, Marina Beach - 39 feet uyaram, 3) Mylapore - pirandha idam endru nambappadugiradhu, 4) Thiruvalluvar Statue, Egmore - near museum, 5) DPI campus Thiruvalluvar statue. Ovvoru government office-lum Thiruvalluvar photo irukkum!

samples.instruction: Thirukkural pottikkal engge nadakkinrana? Parisu enna?
samples.current_output: 1) Tamilnadu government Thirukkural potti - ovvoru varudamum January-la, 2) School/college pottikkal - Thiruvalluvar Dhinathil, 3) All India Thirukkural Competition - various organizations conduct, 4) Online quiz competitions - apps moolam. Parisugal: Panam, certificates, medals, scholarships kooda undu sila pottikkalil.

Tamil Nadu-oda migapperiya thiruvizha. Oru maadham nadakkum. Mukkiya events: 1) Thirukalyanam - Meenakshi-Sundareswarar thirumanam, 2) Azhvaar Thiruveedhi purapaadu - Vishnu's brother role, 3) Therthiruvizha - huge temple car, 4) Theppathiruvizha - float festival at Mariamman Teppakulam. 1 million+ people varuvaargal. Hotels, transport early book seiya vendum. April/May-la veyil adhigam - prepare accordingly.

Thirumandhirathil yoga-vukku arppanikkappattta paguthigal ullana: 1) Ashtaanga Yogam - 8 padigal vilakkam, 2) Praanaayaamam - breathing techniques, 3) Kundalini Yogam - chakra activation, 4) Samaadhi nilai - highest state. 'Udambai valarththen uyir valarththene' - udal paenuvathum aanmeegam endru sonnavar. Hatha yoga-voda Tamil roots inge ullana!

Kural: 'Adakkam amararul uykkum adangaamai aaarirul uyththu vidum'. Adakkam sorgaththukkku kondu sellum, adangaamai naragaththukkku. Melum: 'Kaakka porulaa adakkaththai aakkam adhaninnooung killai uyirkku'. Adakkaththai uyiraip pol kaappaatrungal. Humility = gateway to success!

Darshan timings theriya: 1) Official temple websites - major temples maintain, 2) Dinamalar/Dinakaran temple section, 3) Temple phone numbers - call and ask, 4) Google Maps reviews - visitors update timings, 5) TN Tourism website. General pattern: Morning 6-12, Evening 4-8. Noon break (Uchchi Saandhi) 12-4pm closed. Special darshan (VIP) tickets available in big temples - book online. Festivals-la extended hours. Arrive early for popular temples!

1) Thunbam theerthal adhigaaram - depression-kku udhavum, 2) Ookkamudaimai - motivation loss-kku, 3) Adakkamudaimai - anger management-kku, 4) Poraiyudaimai - patience katrukolla, 5) Innaa seiyaamai - negative thoughts kuraikkA. 'Thunbam varum bodhu adhai eppadi face panradhu' endru Valluvar niraiya solliyirukkaar. Therapists kooda Thirukkural quotes payanpaduththuraanga.

Famous sabhas: Music Academy, Narada Gana Sabha, Mylapore Fine Arts. Culture lovers' paradise!

Azhvaargal - Vaishnava bhakthi iyakkathoda 12 punithargal. 'Azhvaar' endraal 'aazhndhu arindhavar' endru porul - iraivanaai aazhamaga anubhaviththavargal. Ivargal Thirumaalai (Vishnu) paadinaargal. Nalayira Divya Prabandham ivargaloda padaippu - 4000 paasurangal. 108 Divya Desangalai (Vishnu kovilgal) paadiyullanar. Vaishnava sampradhaayathoda aadharam.
